serious.intro: Here are some projects I've been working on...

projects.name: Pill Reminder
projects.description: A smart medication management system designed to assist elderly individuals with dementia by automatically scanning prescriptions and dispensing precise doses at the right time.

projects.name: Drexel Diet
projects.description: A live-updating dining app tailored for Drexel University students, offering personalized meal plans based on the dining hall's menu to support healthy eating and meal planning.

projects.name: PAL
projects.description: A colorblind-friendly palette generator featuring a built-in colorblindness simulator, contrast checker, and color converter to ensure accessibility in design.

projects.name: PII Robot
projects.description: A trash-collecting robot with automated navigation & obstacle avoidance, along with trash (bottles) detection, classification & collection

projects.name: Tuk the Virtual Monkey
projects.description: A finite-state virtual pet with multiple emotions and interactions, developed using Tranquility, a custom programming language created by Professor Brian Stuart for CS-164.

projects.name: Mr. Discipline
projects.description: A versatile Discord bot designed to assist students by playing music, setting timers, taking notes, and creating quizzes for better productivity.

projects.name: Euphoniter
projects.description: An online platform dedicated to music enthusiasts, featuring music reviews, artist biographies, and insights into music theory. My first web development project!

projects.name: Spotify Analyzer
projects.description: A Python script that analyzes Spotify listening history (JSON) to generate insights such as top songs, favorite artists, and total listening time, inspired by Spotify Wrapped.
